titleStmt.title: Fruitfull lessons, vpon the passion, buriall, resurrection, ascension, and of the sending of the holy Ghost Gathered out of the foure Euangelists: with a plaine exposition of the same. By Miles Couerdall.
titleStmt.author: Coverdale, Miles, 1488-1568.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
